DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Insomnia Among Different Types Shift Workers
DOC.detailed_description: Because irregular sleep-wake pattern shift work challenge screen treatment chronic insomnia . Earlier result show CBT-I deliver trained nurse OHS may effective treatment also among worker irregular work hour . The aim present study compare implementation effectiveness OHS deliver group self-help base CBT-I RCT design among different type shift work . Participants ( n=90-120 ) shift worker insomnia disorder last least three month . The participant randomize ) group-based CBT-I ( 6 group session ) ; b ) mainly computerized self-help CBT-I ( individual session intervention ) deliver trained OHS nurse psychologist ; c ) control group give sleep hygiene intervention ( 1 individual session ) . Outcomes assessed use sleep diary , questionnaire , actigraphy cognitive performance test . To study effect CBT-I program molecular level , blood sample participant collect baseline end program genetic analysis . The measurement conduct five time point period two year . The investigator expect find group self-help base CBT-I among different type shift worker effective low-intensity treatment chronic insomnia compare control intervention . Through training OHS general medical practitioner computerise self-help intervention investigator may better chance make CBT-I accessible large number insomniac also different type work hour . Additionally , may possible decrease chronic insomnia unfavourably consequences insomnia health performance capacity shift worker .
DOC.criteria: Chronic Insomnia ( F51.0 ) Difficulty initiate and/or maintain sleep â‰¥ 30 minute and/or use sleep promoting medicine three night per week least 3 month Motivation treat insomnia nonpharmacological method Fulltime shift work ( least 10 % shifts morning , even and/or night shift ) Fluent Finnish ( due intervention ) Nonassessed untreated somatic mental illness may explain insomnia Planned change work ( example retirement )
